targets.expr: sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, direction, result) (rate(p2p_server_message{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[1m]))
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, result, reason) (rate(p2p_server_connect_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[1m]))
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, phase, reason) (rate(p2p_server_handshake_error_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[1m]))
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, direction, reason) (rate(p2p_server_unknown_peer_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[1m]))
